scripts.start: npm run webpack-dev && shadow-cljs watch app bootstrap
scripts.watch-all: npm run webpack-dev && shadow-cljs watch app bootstrap test-browser
scripts.build: npm run webpack-prod && shadow-cljs release app bootstrap && npm run webpack-prod
scripts.build-verbose: npm run webpack-prod && shadow-cljs release --verbose app bootstrap
scripts.report: npm run webpack-prod && shadow-cljs run shadow.cljs.build-report app report.html
scripts.dev-build: npm run webpack-dev && shadow-cljs compile app
scripts.test: npm run webpack-dev && shadow-cljs watch test
scripts.test-browser: npm run webpack-dev && shadow-cljs watch test-browser
scripts.test-once: npm run webpack-dev && shadow-cljs compile test
scripts.nuke: rimraf public/js public/bootstrap .shadow-cljs node_modules yarn.lock package-lock.json out target report.html
